LookOut

Social Startup that helped teachers, using AI, detect in time students with socioemotional problems. Those being bullying, isolation, depression, anxiety and others.

keywords: artificial intelligence start-up mental health cloud computing education

1. 📸

Gathering Data

Images are gathered, encrypted and sent to a local server.

2. 🤖

Data Analysis

Images are analized using facil recognition and machine learning.

3. 📊

Data Visualisation

Key insights are shown through an interactive web app.

How it works

Through facial recognition is possible to detect emotions of each person. You can see the emotion at the top of the facial square.

The algorithm can identify if a person is alone or with someone. A red square means loneliness, meanwhile a blue square means interaction between two or more persons.

Beneficios

⏱

Reliable results

Our system analizes one image each 5 seconds.

📌

Accurate information

Only shows relevant information of each student, focusing on critical cases.

📁

Data integration

It complements with external data such as academic, family or psicologycal records.
